name: Spinach and Artichoke Dip
author: Simmi G
summary: This spinach dip is a huge hit at parties!  It has become one of our favorite appetizers to serve guests when we entertain.  Prepare ahead, but serve warm from the oven with fresh bread, crackers, chips, pita, etc.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
2 ½ cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 1 quart baking dish
In a medium bowl, mix together artichoke hearts, spinach, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese and 2 cups  Monterey Jack cheese
Transfer mixture to the prepared baking dish, and sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup of Monterey Jack cheese
Bake in the center of the preheated oven until the cheese is melted, about 15 minutes
